post:
We’re proud to introduce our exclusive Cloudbuilder VDS!
Cloudbuilder VDS is a VDS/VPS server designed exclusively for linkbuilders and SEO professionals, and is completely adapted to their needs.

Our Cloudbuilder VDS comes preloaded with all of the SEO applications you and your clients need in order to conduct your business and all of them are run on our Citrix Xenserver cloud based infrastructure.

These are the benefits you’re getting:

Relieve your Burdened PC Take the load off your PC when running SEO applications, which enhances its performance and allows you to use it normally, without any annoying interference.

Preloaded Applications Our robust Cloudbuilder server comes with the following applications preloaded:

  • SENukeX
  • The best Spinner
  • Article Marketing Robot
  • SEO Link Robot
  • Scrapebox
  • Bookmarking Demon
  • Private Proxy

Note: You will need your own license if you use these applications on our Cloud infrastructure.

We are open to suggestions and if you need a particular application added to our list, please ask and we will have it packaged and added to the base offering for you.


Wholesale Proxies

We understand your needs, so we have made a deal with Privacy partners to offer you a whopping 50% discount on their fantastic Windows based proxy client.

Use our Discount link

It’s just a matter of firing this bad boy up and you’ll be able to do all of your linkbuilding tasks without getting your IP blocked, as this service offers a cool IP rotation.

Getting blocked due to your IP is a thing of the past!
Click here to sign up now!


Choice of Location

Our Xenserver Cloud is geographically disbursed in data-centers throughout the world. You will be able to choose the location of your Cloud VDS.


Daily Snapshot Backups

We take daily non-disruptive snapshots of your server so that you will never experience this kind of failure.

We are offering an incredible 20% discount for next 50 customers! We’re running this on a first come, first serve basis so act quickly if you don’t want to lose this exclusive discount!

PROMOCODE: VPSEARLYBIRD


CloudBuilder2.0

  • Applications Preloaded and Ready to use
  • Reliable Proxy Services
  • 1 x Quad Core Xeon 2.40 GHz vCPU
  • 4GB RAM
  • 40GB DISK (SAS 15K)
  • 1000GB Bandwidth
  • 1x Static IP
  • Windows 2008 R2 Datacenter Edition
  • Same day Setup
  • Daily Snapshots Included
  • Stop, Start, Suspend, Reboot Control
  • Live Host Migration with Zero Downtime

Standard price $59.95 pm

Order Now
